# WaaSInsiderStatus

Summary of each run of your update schedule with details like how many updates were not installed etc.

|**Resource types**|-|
|**Categories**|Desktop Analytics|
|**Solutions**| WaaSUpdateInsights|
|**Basic log**|No|
|**Ingestion-time transformation**|Yes|
